# Jair Revilla - Moodle Engineer

## Overview
Personal website of Jair Revilla, a Moodle Engineer specializing in high-performance architectures, custom plugin development, and large-scale LMS integrations.

## Core Sections
- **Home**: Introduction, trust signals, and quick access to expertise areas.
- **Case Studies**: Detailed breakdown of complex projects (e.g., Aprendo en Casa Offline).
- **Moodle X-Ray**: Deep dive into technical expertise (Core, Plugins, Integrations, Performance).
- **Plugins Directory**: Catalog of developed Moodle plugins and tools.

## Technical Stack
- **Framework**: Astro 5.0 (Static Site Generation)
- **Styling**: Vanilla CSS with custom Design Tokens
- **Content**: MDX + Astro Content Collections
- **i18n**: Manual routing (/es/, /en/)

## Key Links
- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/jrevilla)
- [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/jrevilla)
